Container.Name: AIOStreams
Container.Overview:
AIOStreams consolidates multiple Stremio addons and debrid services into a single, easily configurable addon. It allows highly customisable filtering, sorting, and formatting of results and supports proxying all your streams through MediaFlow Proxy or StremThru for improved compatibility and IP restriction bypassing.
https://discord.gg/aiostreams

Config.Name: SECRET_KEY
Config.Description: CRITICAL: Secret key for encrypting addon configuration. Generate one using: openssl rand -hex 32

Config.Name: ADDON_PASSWORD
Config.Description: API key to protect your addon installation and usage. Leave empty to disable password protection.

Config.Name: LOG_LEVEL
Config.Description: Set the verbosity of logs. Options:

Config.Name: LOG_TIMEZONE
Config.Description: Adjust the timezone used for logging. e.g. Europe/Paris, America/New_York

Config.Name: REGEX_FILTER_ACCESS
Config.Description: Controls who can use regex filters.

Config.Name: TRUSTED_UUIDS
Config.Description: Comma-separated list of trusted UUIDs. Trusted users can access features like regex filters if REGEX_FILTER_ACCESS is 'trusted'. Example: TRUSTED_UUIDS=ae32f456-1234-5678-9012-345678901234,another-uuid-here

Config.Name: MAX_ADDONS
Config.Description: Maximum number of addons allowed per AIOStreams configuration.

Config.Name: BASE_URL
Config.Description: # The base URL of your addon. Required for proper functioning. # Used for generating installation URLs, identifying self scraping, replacing genre links, generating stream URLs for built in addons etc. # Example: https://aiostreams.yourdomain.com
